title: Did Nancy Belusi remove a 150-year-old marker under the name "In God We Trust" from the entrance to the home room?
subtitle: It's weird that the phrase "in God we trust" wasn't even on paper in the United States 150 years ago.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Nancy Belusi removed a 150-year-old sign that says "In Allah We Trust" from the entrance to the United States House of Representatives.
